name: Uploaded
description: Uploaded is a multiplayer, and single-player, parkour true first-person shooter created by only one developer where you are a robot controlled by an uploaded human brain. You and your friends, along with strangers, can play in a match of Team Death Match, or Death Match, in either a procedural arena or island generated by your computer or play in a handcrafted map! If you’re not in the mood for multiplayer, you can race yourself in a time trial, in a procedural maze-like structure filled with monsters that you must either kill or run from!
